messages.title: Vote Yvette for a strong voice for our towns
messages.content: Over the next few days your postal vote should be landing and you have a very important decision to make. In this election, you get to choose the MP for our area to stand up for us in Parliament. I'm writing to ask for your support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning to stop Tories from cutting 50 teachers from local schools, believing children deserve better.
Lied the campaign to stop Tories from cutting over 30 of our local GPs.
Voted for Article 50 and pushing to get the best Brexit deal for Yorkshire, including support for manufacturing, workers' rights, strong security and new fair immigration controls.

mentions.candidate: Yvette Cooper has taken up over 20,000 cases where people have asked her for help.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories called this election because they are hoping for a landslide to force through bigger cuts for communities like ours while richer areas get more.

issues.brexitEurope: Voted for Article 50 to implement the EU referendum result and pushing to get the best Brexit deal for Yorkshire.
issues.education: Campaigning to stop Tories from cutting 50 teachers from local schools.
issues.health: Lied the campaign to stop Tories from cutting over 30 of our local GPs.

community.content: Helped a family from Pontefract which needed expensive NHS treatment for 6-year-old Cameron so now he can walk.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm the granddaughter of a miner, the daughter of a trade unionist, my three kids were born here in Pontefract, and I've worked hard to help people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Taken up over 20,000 cases where people have asked me for help.

endorsements.endorsement: Yvette stood up for us when my son needed his life-changing operation. I'll be forever grateful for her help - thanks to her his life has totally changed.
I've known Yvette for years and she's always been a hard-working MP who is fighting for our area. She's led the campaign to stop the Government from cutting services and closing facilities.
Yvette's helped lots of kids we know and we hope she gets the new stadium built.
Yvette has always been there to support the work we do here at Castleford Tigers. She helped secure the new stadium!

quotes.text: Yvette stood up for us when my son needed his life-changing operation. I'll be forever grateful for her help - thanks to her his life has totally changed.
I've known Yvette for years and she's always been a hard-working MP who is fighting for our area. She's led the campaign to stop the Government from cutting services and closing facilities.
Yvette's helped lots of kids we know and we hope she gets the new stadium built.
Yvette has always been there to support the work we do here at Castleford Tigers. She helped secure the new stadium!

personalStories.story: Helped a family from Pontefract which needed expensive NHS treatment for 6-year-old Cameron so now he can walk.

examples: Nicola and Cameron Harper: Yvette stood up for us when my son needed his life-changing operation.
Carol Moran: I've known Yvette for years and she's always been a hard-working MP.
Mr and Mrs Carr: Yvette's helped lots of kids we know.
Steve Gill: Yvette has always been there to support the work we do here at Castleford Tigers.
When the Tories tried to cut over 30 of our local GPs, I led the campaign that stopped them.
Let's be honest, if we had a Tory MP for our towns, they wouldn't do any of that.
The Tories called this election because they are hoping for a landslide to force through bigger cuts for communities like ours while richer areas get more.
If we had a Tory MP for our towns, they wouldn't do any of that. It's always Labour fighting for a better deal for us in Parliament.
